name: Freeze
description: A single target up to 5 hexes away is attacked with freezing ice.  The target takes 1 to 10 plus 1 per caster level of Cold damage.  In addition, the target must succeed at a Physical Resistance check or suffer an action point penalty of 15 + caster level for 3 rounds.

upgrades.description: With Glacial Wave, Freeze now affects all creatures within 5 hexes of the caster.  Targets must succeed at a physical resistance check or be frozen solid (paralyzed) for 2 to 4 rounds.  Even if the check is succesful, each creature suffers an Action Point penalty of 15 plus the caster level as well as taking 6 to 12 plus one per caster level cold damage.  Creatures friendly to the caster take only half damage and do not suffer the other negative effects.
